name: Dinari MARA
description: The Dinari dShare token for Marathon Digital Holdings Inc. (MARA.d) represents a 1:1 backed token tied to shares of Marathon Digital Holdings. Each MARA.d token is fully collateralized by an equivalent Marathon share securely held in a transparent treasury. Through blockchain technology, MARA.d provides investors with seamless access to Marathon Digital Holdings shares, offering benefits such as 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlements, and enhanced liquidity. Dinariâ€™s mission is to bridge the gap between traditional finance and blockchain, making investing in leading companies like Marathon Digital more accessible and efficient.
